description.value:
Activate f envision

Trigger You fail or critically fail a Deception, Diplomacy, or Intimidation check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.tHCqgwjtQtzNqVvd]{Coerce}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ewwCglB7XOPLUz72]{Lie}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.DCb62iCBrJXy0Ik6]{Request}

Requirements You're a master in the skill you failed with.

This ornate locket, usually containing a faceless, humanoid portrait, is typically worn on a chain around the neck or attached to your clothing. When activated, the charm casts a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.FhOaQDTSnsY7tiam]{Modify Memory} spell (@Check[type:will|dc:26|traits:mental,spell]) against a single target of the check, removing all memory of your failed attempt and potentially allowing you to make another attempt. The effect can't remove more than 3 minutes of memories from its target.
